events.message: The customer reported that their vehicle was involved in a collision on the highway resulting in moderate damage to the front bumper and hood.
After review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords identified in the report such as vehicle and collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure proper assessment and prompt customer service.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt and informing them of the next steps and expected timelines.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The customer promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and an official police report from the day of the accident.
The investigation team initiated the claims review process, analyzing the submitted documents and verifying details with involved parties.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of the liability and assessment of repair costs based on the submitted evidence and expert opinions.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the full repair costs less the deductible, aiming for a fair and timely resolution.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the support provided throughout the claim process.
Following customer acceptance, the claim was officially approved, confirming the terms and paving the way for payment issuance.
The agreed compensation amount was paid to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover all authorized vehicle repairs.
With payment complete and no further queries, the claim was officially closed, concluding the auto accident insurance process.
